Package tools

Class SnpEffAnnotator

java.lang.Object
tools.SnpEffAnnotator
public final class SnpEffAnnotator
extends java.lang.Object
Runs local installation of SnpEff via command line.

Used to run SnpEff .vcf file annotations.

  • Method Details

    • runSnpEff

      public static void runSnpEff​(ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.io.IOException, MusialIOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Conducts SnpEff annotation on each sample.

      A version of SnpEff is contained within the JAR locally. The snpEff.jar and snpEff.config files are copied into a temporary directory in order to run. Next, the configuration file is adjusted and the reference sequence and annotation files are copied into a temporary directory (as it is required for SnpEff in order to execute). After generating a database with the specified reference files, SnpEff is run on each single sample .vcf file.

      Parameters:
      arguments - Instance of ArgumentsParser containing the command line options specified by the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any copy procedure or writing to a file fails.
      MusialIOException - If any generation of output directories or files fails.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If a single thread was interrupted.
